name: 42 Macro
title: Will Magnificent Seven Earnings Disappoint Investors?
text:
Synopsis
The Magnificent Seven tech companies are positioned for potentially strong earnings, with most stocks showing bullish signals and varying upside potential, though companies may pivot to more cost-effective and productivity-focused strategies.

Key Insights
- ASML reported Q4 results with order bookings of 7 billion euros, more than double the Bloomberg consensus estimate of 3.5 billion euros
- Tech companies may be reconsidering investment strategies in light of deep tech developments
- Potential shift towards more cost-effective strategies that increase productivity rather than simply reducing costs
- Individual Magnificent Seven stock analysis:
  * Apple: Neutral and overbought
  * Amazon: Bullish and mid-range
  * Google: Bullish with over 2:1 upside potential
  * Meta: Bullish with roughly 2:1 downside
  * Microsoft: Bullish and mid-range
  * Nvidia: Bullish and oversold
  * Tesla: Bullish with nearly 5:1 upside potential
- The Magnificent Seven to S&P 500 ratio is currently bullish
